verses.name: Jude 1:16
verses.text: These are murmurers, complainers, walking after their own lusts; and their mouth speaketh great swelling words, having men’s persons in admiration because of advantage.

verses.name: Jude 1:17
verses.text: But, beloved, remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ;

verses.name: Jude 1:18
verses.text: How that they told you there should be mockers in the last time, who should walk after their own ungodly lusts.

verses.name: Jude 1:19
verses.text: These be they who separate themselves, sensual, having not the Spirit.

verses.name: Jude 1:20
verses.text: But ye, beloved, building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Ghost,
